cancellationPolicies.label: Deposit Only rates
cancellationPolicies.description: This property has a 2 day cancellation policy. Failure to cancel within this time will result in a cancellation charge equal to the first night of your stay, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information).

privates.name: Deluxe Twin Room Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Deluxe private twin room with two single beds, a small hand basin, a garden view and verandah access. Shared communal bathrooms and lounge in the Deluxe B&B wing as well as access to a large communal hostel kitchen. Outdoor seating is also available.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 22nd Oct 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 22nd Oct 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
